overview: Tom Cameron is searching for the outlaws who ambushed a wagon train, murdered his parents and stole the deed to their land. Though he was only a child at the time, he vividly remembers the scar on the ringleader's face -- and Tom will stop at nothing until he brings him to justice â€¦ and exacts vengeance.
tagline: THUNDERING GUNS SING A SONG OF DEATH FOR THE OUTLAWS OF THE OLD WEST!
title: The Lone Rider Rides On
